mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, MESSAGE_READ_FL, USER_DEL_FL, ADMIN_DEL_FL, SENDER_NO, RECEIVER_NO, REPLY_YN, NULL AS FILE_NO, NULL AS FILE_URL, NULL AS FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, NULL AS FILE_RENAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE WHERE USER_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC

SELECT hm.MESSAGE_NO, hm.MESSAGE_TITLE, hm.MESSAGE_CONTENT, hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, hm.MESSAGE_READ_FL, hm.USER_DEL_FL, hm.ADMIN_DEL_FL, hm.SENDER_NO, hm.RECEIVER_NO, hm.REPLY_YN, mf.FILE_NO, mf.FILE_URL, mf.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, mf.FILE_RENAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_FILE mf ON hm.MESSAGE_NO = mf.MESSAGE_NO WHERE hm.MESSAGE_NO = #{messageNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HELP_MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, MESSAGE_READ_FL, USER_DEL_FL, ADMIN_DEL_FL, REPLY_YN, SENDER_NO, RECEIVER_NO, INQUIRED_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MESSAGE_NO.NEXTVAL, '답변', #{messageContent}, SYSDATE, 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', #{senderNo}, #{receiverNo}, #{inquiredNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT hm.MESSAGE_NO, hm.MESSAGE_TITLE, hm.MESSAGE_CONTENT, hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, hm.MESSAGE_READ_FL, hm.USER_DEL_FL, hm.ADMIN_DEL_FL, hm.SENDER_NO, hm.RECEIVER_NO, hm.REPLY_YN, NULL AS FILE_NO, NULL AS FILE_URL, NULL AS FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, NULL AS FILE_RENAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON hm.SENDER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE hm.SENDER_NO != #{adminId} AND hm.REPLY_YN = 'N' AND hm.USER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND hm.ADMIN_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY hm.MESSAGE_NO DESC

SELECT hm.MESSAGE_NO, hm.MESSAGE_TITLE, hm.MESSAGE_CONTENT, hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, hm.MESSAGE_READ_FL, hm.USER_DEL_FL, hm.ADMIN_DEL_FL, hm.SENDER_NO, hm.RECEIVER_NO, hm.REPLY_YN, mf.FILE_NO, mf.FILE_URL, mf.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, mf.FILE_RENAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON hm.SENDER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_FILE mf ON hm.MESSAGE_NO = mf.MESSAGE_NO WHERE hm.INQUIRED_NO IS NOT NULL AND hm.SENDER_NO = #{userNo} AND hm.USER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND hm.ADMIN_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE DESC
SELECT FILE_NO, MESSAGE_NO, FILE_URL, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_RENAME FROM MESSAGE_FILE WHERE MESSAGE_NO = #{messageNo}

SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, MESSAGE_READ_FL, USER_DEL_FL, ADMIN_DEL_FL, SENDER_NO, RECEIVER_NO, REPLY_YN, NULL AS FILE_NO, NULL AS FILE_URL, NULL AS FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, NULL AS FILE_RENAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE WHERE SENDER_NO = #{adminNo} AND RECEIVER_NO = #{userNo} AND REPLY_YN = 'Y' AND USER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ADMIN_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE DESC
